title: New from Step2: Waterfall Discovery Wall
description: Double the playtime fun with the Waterfall Discovery Wall by Step2. Children can allow their imagination to run wild as each water maze piece can be moved to create a new design.

asset.author: Step2
asset.description:
Double the playtime fun with the Waterfall Discovery Wall by Step2. Children can allow their imagination to run wild as each water maze piece can be moved to create a new design.

To learn more about Step2, please visit https://www.step2.com/

To learn more about Step2 water tables, please visit https://www.step2.com/c/kids-toys/sand-water-play/

To learn more about the Waterfall Discovery Wall, please click here:  http://www.step2.com/p/waterfall-discovery-wall

transcripts: Get your water gear spinning and splash on over here to play with the best new toy of the year. Invite your friends to play all day on this water wall that's double the fun fro everyone. Mini aquatic adventurers will love scooping up the water from the bottom lagoon and pouring it in the top swoopy water dune. Watch as the water cascades in the maze of ramps, wheels, and funnels. Swaying as they spin and spray water you way. Kiddos will even learn cause and effect with this water wall and they mix and match the movable zig-zag maze creating endless ways to play. Play a game with your friends by creating a new cascades on both sides of the water fall then pour the water down the wall  in a race to first place. Made of strong durable materials, this water wall will last fro years of fun to come. The water fall discovery wall by Step 2.
